column1: #Text=Where am I ?
#Text=" Yue says : " You are in the Spirit World .
#Text=" Aang says : " Princess Yue !
#Text=" Yue says : " Aang , your Avatar Spirit has been injured .
#Text=If you do n't act fast , you will lose your connection to your past lives ... and the Avatar Cycle will end .
#Text=You must find your previous four past lives and reconnect with them .
#Text=" Aang says : " How do I do that ?
#Text=" Yue says : " You will find them here , in the Spirit World .
#Text=But be careful ... Koh will try to steal your face .
#Text=Be careful about what spirits you talk to .
#Text=Some will help you , but others work for Koh , and they will trick you .
#Text=Good luck , Aang .
#Text=" Aang says : " Roku , where are you ?
#Text=Aaahh !
#Text=" Roku says : " Hello Aang .
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm sorry , Roku ... I tried to master the Avatar State ... but I failed .
#Text=" Roku says : " Mastering the Avatar State takes much spiritual discipline and patience .
#Text=I learned this the hard way .
#Text=" Aang says : " Where are we going ?
#Text=" Roku says : " To the Fire Sage 's temple .
#Text=One - hundred - fifty - four years ago ... "
